tool_description: Quickly retrieve original Arabic text, translation, transliteration and Word Search from the Koran /Quran
title: Al-Quran

api_list.name: Get range of verses
api_list.description: Responds with a collection of *Ayahs/Verses* in a specific *Chapter/Surah* along with original Arabic text, translation, transliteration and verse ID in JSON
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com/{chapterid}/{range}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you show me verses 5 to 10 from chapter 2?
I want to read verses 1 through 7 of chapter 18.
Please provide verses 12 to 15 from chapter 36.
Could you get verses 20 to 25 from chapter 50?
Show me verses 3 to 8 in chapter 55.
Retrieve verses 10 to 14 from chapter 67.
I need verses 1 to 5 from chapter 9.
Get verses 7 through 11 of chapter 24.
Please fetch verses 2 to 6 from chapter 30.
Can you provide verses 15 to 20 from chapter 40?

api_list.name: Get base information
api_list.description: Responds with JSON including some properties of the Quran. *(deprecated)*
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you provide me with some basic details about the Quran?
I would like to know the general information available about the Quran.
Give me an overview of the Quran's properties.
What are the fundamental details listed for the Quran?
Show me the basic metadata related to the Quran.
Could you fetch the primary information about the Quran for me?
I want to see the general attributes of the Quran.
Retrieve the essential information about the Quran.
Please provide the summary details of the Quran.
What basic information can you give me about the Quran?

api_list.name: Get entire Surah/Chapter
api_list.description:
Possible values: ***1-114*** 
Responds with entire Surah/Chapter of the Koran including all verses in the Surah and some additional information.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com/{chapterid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

parameters.name: chapterId
parameters.description:
Represents a unique Surah/Chapter in the Koran.
**Min Value: *1***
**Max Value: *114***

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the full text of Surah Al-Fatiha?
I want to read the entire Surah Al-Baqarah from the Quran.
Please provide the complete verses of Surah An-Nisa.
Could you fetch the whole Surah Al-Ma'idah for me?
Show me all the verses in Surah Yusuf.
I would like to see the entire Surah Ar-Rahman.
Retrieve the full chapter of Surah Al-Ikhlas.
Can you get the complete Surah Al-Kawthar for me?
Please display the entire Surah An-Nas.
I want to read the full Surah Al-Anfal from the Quran.

api_list.name: Get specific Ayah/Verse
api_list.description: Responds with a specific *Ayah/Verse* in a specific *Chapter/Surah* along with original Arabic text, translation, transliteration and verse ID in JSON
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com/{chapterid}/{verseid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

parameters.name: chapterId
parameters.description:
Refers to a *Surah/Chapter* in the Koran
**Min Value: *1***
**Max Value: *114***

parameters.name: verseId
parameters.description: A valid *Ayah/verse* number from a specific chapter from the Quran

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the 5th verse from the 2nd chapter of the Quran?
I want to read verse number 12 from chapter 18.
Please provide the text and translation of verse 7 in chapter 50.
Could you get me the 23rd ayah from the 36th surah?
Show me verse 1 from chapter 1 of the Quran.
I need the 45th verse from the 55th chapter.
Retrieve verse number 10 from chapter 99.
Get me the 30th ayah in the 67th chapter.
Please fetch verse 15 from chapter 114.
I want to see the 3rd verse of chapter 22.

api_list.name: Search for a word in Quran
api_list.description: Looks for a given keyword (English) in ***translation_eng*** key in the entire Koran and responds with all the verses containing the given keyword and toal matches in JSON
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com/corpus/{searchterm}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Any given keyword or phrase you like to search for in the Koran

utterances.utterance: Can you find all the verses that mention the word 'mercy' in the Quran?
Show me Quranic verses where the term 'prophet' appears in the English translation.
I want to see all the Quran verses containing the keyword 'faith'.
Please list the verses that include the word 'forgiveness' in the English translation of the Quran.
Find all occurrences of the word 'paradise' in the Quran's English translation.
Could you retrieve verses where the word 'justice' is mentioned in the Quran?
I want to search for the keyword 'patience' in the Quranic text translations.
List all Quran verses that contain the word 'guidance' in their English translation.
Show me all the verses where the term 'charity' appears in the Quran's English translation.
Can you find every verse that includes the word 'truth' in the English translation of the Quran?
